title: League Graphical Performance Dip
body:
League was fine. I was getting 250average/fps on max settings. But as of now I'm pulling 60-80 on high settings, with occasional dips. 
This is all after fresh Windows install (drivers and everything else are exact same).

Why am I having such a performance drop for no reason?

Specs: 16gb ddr3 2133 (I think) Ram
             GTX 770 SC 
             i7 4770 (3.4b 3.9boost)

replies.body: With a fresh Windows install, you may have outdated drivers that could be causing this.  Go over the steps in the [FPS issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) guide to help tune up your PC and fix it up.  I hope that helps!
